com.google.appinventor.client.widgets

Class Toolbar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
        • com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
          • com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.Toolbar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasAttachHandlers, HasHandlers, EventListener, HasVisibility, IsRenderable, IsWidget
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DesignToolbar, ProjectToolbar

    public class Toolbar
extends Composite
    A Toolbar is a horizontal arrangement of buttons (which can be a mixture of regular and drop-down buttons). There is a left-aligned group of buttons and a right-aligned group.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Toolbar.ToolbarItem
      A Toolbar item has a widgetName that is unique over all items in the toolbar, a caption (displayed to the user) and a command to run when the item is selected.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject

        UIObject.DebugIdImpl, UIObject.DebugIdImplEnabled

        Parameters:

      • addButton

        protected void addButton(Toolbar.ToolbarItem item,
             boolean rightAlign,
             boolean top)
        Parameters:
        item - button to add
        rightAlign - true if button is right-aligned, false if left
        top - special styling if the button is on the top.

      • addDropDownButton

        protected void addDropDownButton(String dropDownName,
                     String caption,
                     List<DropDownButton.DropDownItem> items,
                     boolean rightAlign)
        Adds a drop down button to the toolbar
        Parameters:
        dropDownName - name used for internal map
        caption - name of button
        items - list of items to add to drop down; null items indicate a separator should be addded
        rightAlign - button should be right aligned in toolbar

      • addDropDownButton

        protected void addDropDownButton(String dropDownName,
                     String caption,
                     List<DropDownButton.DropDownItem> items,
                     boolean rightAlign,
                     boolean top)
        Parameters:
        dropDownName - name used for internal map
        caption - name of button
        items - list of items to add to the drop down; null items indicate a separator
        rightAlign - button should be right aligned in toolbar
        top - special style if button is added to the topPanel
